ranks.text: After 6/25, visit Kanda Church and talk to the girl towards the front. To start the cooperation you'll need at least rank 3 (suave) charm, otherwise she'll just ignore you.Unlocks Koma Sabaki, which lets you swap out party members on the fly mid-battle whenever it's Joker's turn.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Bonus: Knowledge Up
choices: Choice 3: "But you don't want to, right?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Uchikomi, giving your non-present allies a chance to drop in for an extra attack after an enemy is downed.Bonus: Knowledge Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Knowledge UpUnlocks the Book Town location.
choices: Choice 1: "I didn't mind." +2 / "Must've been the katsu curry." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Kakoi Kuzushi, which allows you to attempt to escape from battle even when enemies have you surrounded.Bonus: Knowledge Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Knowledge UpUnlocks the Sky Tower Location.
choices: Choice 2: "Do what you love." +2 / "Do you still like shogi?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Narikin, a chance to get double money if you win the battle in one full party turn after an ambush.Bonus: Knowledge Up
choices: Choice 1: "It may all come down to luck." +3 / "That's almost a relief." +2
Choice 2: "I believe in you." +3 / "Give it your all." +2

ranks.text: Requires rank 5 (erudite) knowledge.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: Upstaging the Stage Mother.Complete the Upstaging the Stage Mother sidequest, then return to Hifumi:Bonus: Knowledge Up

This is the point when a romance with Hifumi Togo becomes available.Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Romance - "I want to stay by your side."Friendship - "I want to become stronger."Romance - "I want us to date."Friendship - "We'll be friends forever."Unlocks Touryou, removing the need to wait before you can escape from battle.
Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.Unlocks Togo System, allowing you to switch in and out party members during any party member's turn.
